channel.title: Setup Guide on Bring Your Own Keys Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Setup Guide on Bring Your Own Keys Blog

item.title: Add your wallets
item.description: Add your wallet by ENS name, or Ethereum EVM address. The name is your choice, for display purposes only. The address is never stored on a centralized server. It stays in your browser’s localStorage only, and gets sent to the data providers (e.g., Alchemy, Etherscan) when we request any blockchain data for the first time.

item.title: Known Chains
item.description: üóùÔ∏è BYOK App is multi-chain by construction The following EVM chains are supported: - Ethereum - Polygon POS - Optimism - Arbitrum One.
